hero.title: About EcoHub Kosova
hero.subtitle: EcoHub Kosova is a bilingual platform that connects recyclable materials, recyclers, and green services – turning advocacy for a circular economy into daily, practical cooperation between businesses, municipalities, and citizens.

advocacy.heading: From campaign website to green infrastructure
advocacy.body:
EcoHub started as an advocacy initiative of Kosovo Advocacy and Development Centre (KADC) to raise awareness about waste, air pollution and the need for a circular economy. As the ecosystem grew, one need became clear: stakeholders did not just need information – they needed a common place to find each other and cooperate.

EcoHub Kosova V2 is that place: a neutral, public-good marketplace where recyclable materials, collection services, recycling companies and green solutions can be listed, discovered and connected.

actions.heading: What you can do on EcoHub

businesses.title: For businesses & recyclers
items: List recyclable materials, recycled products or green services
Find new suppliers and clients in Kosovo's circular economy
Track basic analytics on how often your listings are viewed or contacted

municipalities.title: For municipalities & institutions
items: See which recyclers and services operate in your area
Map potential partners for tenders, pilots and local programs
Share EcoHub with local businesses as a practical tool, not only a brochure

citizens.title: For citizens & communities
items: Discover where materials can go instead of landfill
Explore local green initiatives and services
Share relevant listings with businesses and neighbours

who.heading: Who runs EcoHub Kosova?
who.body:
EcoHub Kosova is developed and maintained by Kosovo Advocacy and Development Centre (KADC), a civil society organization working on public health, clean air and sustainable development.

Together with partners from Kosovo and the wider region, KADC ensures that EcoHub remains:
principles: focused on practical solutions that reduce waste and pollution
